FuncDef: The display stp process region-configuration command displays a Multiple Spanning Tree (MST) region's valid configuration, including the region name, revision level, mappings between VLANs and spanning tree instances, and configuration digest. The display stp process region-configuration command displays a Multiple Spanning Tree (MST) region's valid configuration, including the region name, revision level, mappings between VLANs and spanning tree instances, and configuration digest.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of a Multiple Spanning Tree Protocol (MSTP) process.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 256.

Displays digest of a valid MST region configuration.
-

ExtraInfo:
After an MST region is configured and takes effect on the MSTP network, run the display stp region-configuration command to view the MST region name, revision level, mapping between STP MSTIs and VLANs.
For description about MSTP process 0, see stp process.
